description:
METAR data is a form of weather data that comes in standardized human readable (really!) text. Pilots and meteorologists can glance at a page of METAR data and get an accurate 3D picture of the weather over huge regions and altitudes. NOAA helpfully puts METAR and TAF data on the web for free. This app downloads the METAR and TAF and displays the data in a simple list for easy reading.

This app, the light version, is intended for people that already know how to read METAR and TAF data (pilots and the like) — if you don't know how to read METAR already, check out the full app.
